sen.j: 伏見宮邦道親王（ふしみのみや くにみちしんのう、寛永18年（1641年） - 承応3年7月20日 (旧暦)（1654年9月1日））は、江戸時代初期の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kunimichi (1641 - September 1, 1654) was a member of the Imperial family during the early Edo period.
Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kunimichi (1641 - September 1, 1654) was a member of the Imperial family in the early Edo period.
Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kunimichi (1641 - September 1, 1654) was a member of the Imperial family in the early Edo period.
He was the twelfth head of the Fushiminomiya family.
He was the twelfth head of the Fushiminomiya family.
He was the twelfth head of the Fushiminomiya family.

sen.j: 父は伏見宮第10代当主の伏見宮貞清親王。
sen.e: His father was Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadakiyo who was the tenth head of the Fushiminomiya family.
His father was Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadakiyo who was the tenth head of the Fushiminomiya family.
His father was Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadakiyo who was the tenth head of the Fushiminomiya family.
In 1649, he was given the title of Imperial Prince.
In 1649, he was given the title of Imperial Prince.
In 1649, he was given the title of Imperial Prince.
In 1651, he experienced genpuku (celebration of one's coming of age).
In 1651, he experienced genpuku (a rite to mark the attainment of manhood).
sen.cmt: celebration of one's coming of age→a rite to mark the attainment of manhood
sen.e: In 1651, he experienced genpuku (a coming-of-age celebration for boys).
